name: Koala Hopper
text: This card cannot be destroyed by card effects. If this card is sent to the GY for the Fusion Summon of a "Koala" monster: That monster cannot be destroyed by battle or by card effects until the end of your opponent's next turn. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Koala" Spell/Trap card from your GY to your hand.
